name: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol. 12: Katei no Igaku: Shindan Jiten
overview: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol.12 - Katei no Ikagu - Shindan Jiten is the twelth game in the practical 1500 series released for the Playstation One console by D3 Publisher. This time the game let the user to ask a virtual doctor different questions and learn about diseases and prevention methods. The game is a complete medical encyclopedia.
